talk_1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>But I'm grateful. When my vehicle's
damaged, I like to do a little...borrowing.

Speaking of, could I perhaps borrow<sp:5:0:0> your
life?<sp:5:1:0> Well, Link?

<snd:Think>What sort of fool runs around naked in
a place like this?!
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wow, you really did it!


Well now.<sp:5:0:0> I can finally relax...
0020: So what are you up to?
talk_1011:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Eyaaaaaagh!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Y-y-<sp:5:1:0>you surprised me...<sp:5:0:0> Don't do that!


I thought you might've been from the Yiga
Clan for a second. <sp:5:1:0>Hurry up and get your
research clothes on!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> You don't have research clothes?


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait, are you in the Yiga Clan?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>I gave you all those warnings, and you're
still geared up for a fight!<sp:5:0:0> You, you...<sp:5:0:0>
you COWARD!
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You dare claim to be a part of our
clan?! <sp:5:0:0>Absurd!
talk_1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>H-<sp:5:0:0>how many times to do I have to say it?!


If you want me to believe you,<sp:5:0:0> come back
without any clothes or weapons! How else
can I know you're not in the Yiga Clan?
<snd:Angry_01>If you talk to me again as you are...<sp:5:0:0>there's
gonna be trouble!
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>D-don't lie! I know the Yiga are all
masters of disguise!

Prove you don't have a Yiga uniform on
under there!<sp:5:0:0> Take off everything you're
wearing! Oh, and ditch the weapons too! 
Try anything funny...<sp:5:0:0>and you'll face these
furious researcher fists!
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Lots of <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> around here...<sp:5:0:0>
Who could have been using all this?
talk_1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Painful>Tch...<sp:5:0:0> Then it looks like I have no choice
but to raise the alarm.
talk_1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You see all these <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> here,
yes?<sp:5:0:0> Is this a supply point, perhaps?

<clr:0000>You find these occasionally<clr:ffff> in the Depths,
though I have no idea who leaves them
in these places...
talk_1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>But I'm grateful. When my vehicle's
damaged, I like to do a little...borrowing.

Speaking of, could I perhaps borrow<sp:5:0:0> your
life?<sp:5:0:0> Well, Link?

<snd:Think>What sort of fool removes all his gear
because a stranger asks him to?!
talk_1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Wait...


Why would I let you get away<sp:5:0:0> when you've
left yourself wide open?
talk_1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>D-<sp:5:0:0>don't lie!<sp:5:1:0>


If you want me to believe you...<sp:5:0:0>take off
everything you're wearing! You could have
a Yiga uniform on under there!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, wait.<sp:5:0:0> No, you couldn't. You're already
pretty clothes-less as it is.

<snd:Chat_01>Phew, what a relief!<sp:5:1:0> But seriously, please
don't scare me like that!
talk_1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm.<sp:5:0:0> Who's running around using all
these <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>?
talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Gyah! <sp:5:0:0>Who?!


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Phew, just a fellow Yiga.<sp:5:0:0> Need to stock up
on <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>?

Just be quick about it. I'm trying to take
Link by surprise here...
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What's wrong? If you need <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>,
then get to it.<sp:5:0:0> If you're here when that
guy arrives, he'll know something's up.
